TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IHelpService

summary.span: 提供在設計階段顯示說明主題以及加入和移除 Help 關鍵字的方法。

span.span: Provides methods for showing Help topics and adding and removing Help keywords at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計階段環境提供會嘗試找出在使用者按下 F1 時顯示的相關說明主題的說明系統。The design-time environment provides a Help system that attempts to locate relevant Help topics to display when a user presses F1. [說明] 系統會維護一組目前的內容關鍵字，可用來識別要求說明的相關主題。The Help system maintains a set of current context keywords that are used to identify relevant topics if Help is requested. 根據預設，關鍵字是與所選取的類別物件和屬性的設計階段環境中的物件相關聯。By default, keywords are associated with selected class objects and properties of objects in the design time environment. 元件或屬性的預設關鍵字是其完整的類別或屬性名稱。The default keyword for a component or property is its fully qualified class or property name. 特定關鍵字也會與特定的模式，例如當選取多個物件相關聯。Specific keywords are also associated with certain modes, such as when multiple objects are selected. 如果自訂的說明集合藉由設定外部說明提供者整合的設計階段環境，文件提供者可以將關聯之特定元件的類別或屬性的主題完整的項目所組成的關鍵字限定的型別或成員名稱。If a custom Help collection is integrated with the design-time environment by configuring it for an external help provider, a documentation provider can associate a topic for a specific component class or property with a keyword consisting of the item's fully qualified type or member name. 可用來叫用指定的關鍵字，使用說明服務方法，或叫用指定的 URL 使用說明主題方法。The can be used to invoke the help service with a specified keyword using the method, or to invoke a help topic from a specified URL using the method. 也可用來新增或移除說明關鍵字，在設計階段。The can also be used to add or remove Help keywords at design time. 選取的元件或在設計時間設定的完整型別或成員名稱的選取範圍，所組成的預設內容關鍵字，並移除任何先前選取的關鍵字並不會再選取的元件的屬性。Selecting a component or property at design time sets a default context keyword consisting of the fully qualified type or member name of the selection, and removes the keywords for any previously selected and no longer selected components or properties. [說明] 系統不會自動移除自訂的 Help 關鍵字，因為您必須明確移除自訂關鍵字時不再適用。Because the Help system does not automatically remove custom Help keywords, you must explicitly remove a custom keyword when it no longer applies. 您可以監視所定義之事件介面，以判斷當元件選取範圍變更時。You can monitor the events defined by the interface to determine when a component selection changes. 根據這些事件，當選取時新增元件的說明內容屬性，和選取範圍不會再包含的元件時移除說明內容屬性。Based on those events, you can add a Help context attribute for a component when it is selected and then remove the Help context attribute when the selection no longer includes the component. ## Examples 下列範例將示範會使用設計工具新增和移除說明內容屬性包含的控制項。The following example demonstrates a designer that uses the to add and remove Help context attributes for the included control. 若要使用這個範例，編譯類別庫並加入至控制項的執行個體。To use this sample, compile it to a class library and add an instance of the control to a . 在設計檢視中，選取元件，並按下 F1 嘗試查閱根據目前的說明內容關鍵字或關鍵字的相關說明主題。In design view, selecting the component and pressing F1 attempts to look up relevant Help topics based on the current Help context keyword or keywords. 以滑鼠右鍵按一下元件，並快顯功能表顯示命令，包括兩個自訂命令名為`Add IHelpService Help Keyword`和`Remove IHelpService Help Keyword`。Right-click the component and the shortcut menu displays commands, including two custom commands named `Add IHelpService Help Keyword` and `Remove IHelpService Help Keyword`. 這些命令可以用來新增或移除說明內容關鍵字的值"IHelpService 」，從而試著提高主題時按下 F1。These commands can be used to add or remove a Help context keyword of the value "IHelpService", which attempts to raise the topic when F1 is pressed. [!code-cpp[IHelpServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IHelpServiceExample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IHelpServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IHelpServiceExample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IHelpServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IHelpServiceExample/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddContextAttribute (string name, string value, System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordType keywordType);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddContextAttribute(string name, string value, valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.HelpKeywordType keywordType) cil managed
Public Sub AddContextAttribute (name As String, value As String, keywordType As HelpKeywordType)
public: void AddContextAttribute(System::String ^ name, System::String ^ value, System::ComponentModel::Design::HelpKeywordType keywordType);

span.span: The name of the attribute to add.

param.name: keywordType
param.span: 關鍵字的型別，來自列舉型別 。

span.span: The type of the keyword, from the enumeration .
Adds a context attribute to the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內容屬性可用來提供給使用者的即時線上說明。Context attributes are used to provide context-sensitive Help to users. 設計工具主應用程式會自動加入從特定的元件和屬性上的可用說明屬性的內容屬性。The designer host automatically adds context attributes from available Help attributes on certain components and properties. 這個方法可讓您進一步自訂即時線上說明。This method allows you to further customize the context-sensitive Help.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ClearContextAttributes ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ClearContextAttributes() cil managed
Public Sub ClearContextAttributes ()
public: void ClearContextAttributes();

summary.span: 從文件中移除所有現有的內容屬性。

span.span: Removes all existing context attributes from the document.

summary.span: 建立本機的 以管理子內容。

span.span: Creates a local to manage subcontexts.

param.span: 要顯示之 [說明] 主題的關鍵字。

summary.span: 顯示對應至指定關鍵字的 [說明] 主題。

span.span: Shows the Help topic that corresponds to the specified keyword.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Visual Studio 整合式的開發環境的說明系統中顯示的主題。The Visual Studio integrated development environment's Help system displays the topic.
